description:
Many of you may know Phenix from his appearances on other sites.
I've been looking for more guys who "know what to do" in order to help with the straight guys, and after talking to him about an Edge video, I decided I wanted to work with him.
Though he is straight too, Phenix is very comfortable, and I would say even eager to make hot videos. He's a top, and its tough to get him to go beyond that.(I'm workin on it!) But I definitely wanted his skills and chemistry over at ChaosMen.
Ironically, given his body of work, I've never even seen him fuck a guy.
And WOW! I had no idea he could fuck so ferociously! Thankfully Saber can take licking too!
And if you love some cum eating to finish off a video, you will love the ending!
title: Phenix & Saber - Wrapped
